item.title: D.C. crash investigators focus on altitude and vision quality of helicopter crew
item.description: Investigators are still working to piece together key details to determine the cause of the crash that killed 67 people.

item.title: Elon Musk's X sues Lego, Nestlé and more brands, accusing them of advertising boycott
item.description: The new defendants added into the legal filing included Lego, Nestlé, Tyson Foods, Abbott Laboratories, Colgate-Palmolive, Pinterest and Shell Interna...

item.title: Trump imposes new tariffs on imports from Mexico, Canada and China in new phase of trade war
item.description: Starting Tuesday, nearly all imports from Canada and Mexico will be charged a 25% tariff, while goods from China will be charged a 10% tariff.

item.title: NPR reporters discuss covering the LA wildfires
Third Black Hawk crew member involved in deadly crash near DC airport identified
